captions.text: What kind of gun is this?

If any of these little fuckers
decide to freak out on the kids,
I get to take them down.

That's what I thought.
Shut up.

That's the most powerful
tranq gun on the market.

It could puncture
the skin of a rhino from...

You just took one
in the jugular, man!

Oh, my god, I did.
Is this bad?

Is this bad?
You should pull that out.

[distorted voice: ]
that shit is not cool.

[ distorted voice: ]
wait... Wait.
Pull what out?

You got a fuckin' dart
in your neck.
